DESCRIPTION: I’m currently pursuing an MSc in Computer Engineering, following a bachelor’s degree in Management Engineering from Politecnico di Torino. My passion lies in the dynamic intersection of technology and management, with a particular focus on software development and innovation. As I work on my final thesis, I’m eager to embrace the challenges and opportunities that lie ahead, and I look forward to beginning my professional journey in the tech industry.

EDU.BACHELOR_INFO: I attended the bachelor’s degree in Management Engineering (L-8, Information Engineering) at Politecnico di Torino.
EDU.MASTER_INFO: I’m currently pursuing the master’s degree in Computer Engineering (Software orientation) at Politecnico di Torino.
